## cubicFromLine variable

Converts line segment `a` -<!-- -->&gt; `b` into a cubic curve, which when sampled yields uniformly spaced points. The inner control points are located at 1/3 and 2/3 respectively.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
cubicFromLine: (a: Vec, b: Vec) => Vec[]
```
